site_name: 2-4 Copse Hill And 52-54 Brighton RoadSuttonSM2 6AD

application_details.lead_developer_company_name: McCarthy and Stone Retirement Lifestyles Ltd

description: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a part 5 storey part 6 storey building comprising 43 retirement living units for older persons with vehicular access from Copse Hill, associated communal facilities, landscaping, car parking, cycle storage and bin store.
